insights.desc: Introducing how to use the Highlight Mode in Summary view.

insights.desc: Introducing how to use the Correlation Moode in Summary view.

insights.title: How to Create Dashboard
insights.desc: Shows you how to create your first Dashboard in Exploratory!

insights.title: How to Create Note
insights.desc: Shows you how you to create your first Note in Exploratory!

insights.title: Data Wrangling Steps - Copy, Cache, Disable, & Export
insights.desc: Walks you through 4 powerful features of the Data Wrangling Steps that would make your data wrangling life more productive.

data.title: Data Wrangling
data.desc: Learn how to clean & transform data!

insights.title: Convert Data Type
insights.desc: This is about how to convert Data Type.

insights.title: Convert to Date & Time Data Type
insights.desc: This is about how to convert Date & Time Data Type.

insights.title: Join - Add Columns
insights.desc: How to add columns from another data frame

insights.title: Join - Filter Data
insights.desc: Shows you how to filter data based on another data frame by using Semi Join or Anti Join steps.

insights.title: Merge - Add Rows
insights.desc: Shows you how to merge multiple data frames to add rows in Exploratory.

insights.title: Transform Wide Data to Long Data
insights.desc: Shows you how to transform Wide data to Long data in Exploratory.

insights.title: Transform Long Data to Wide Data
insights.desc: Shows you how to transform Long format data to Wide format data, and quickly run a correlation analysis in Exploratory

insights.title: Summarize Data
insights.desc: Shows you how to summarize data as the data wrangling step.

insights.title: Convert Country Name & Code
insights.desc: Shows you how to convert the country names and codes

insights.title: Returning TRUE or FALSE with Condition
insights.desc: Shows you how to create conditions with various types of logical functions (operators) as calculations in Exploratory.

insights.title: Factor Data Type for Ordinal Data
insights.desc: Shows you how you can manually set the order for the values of a given column and visualize the data with Chart view in Exploratory.

insights.title: Conditional Value Assignment (Case When)
insights.desc: Shows you how you can assign values based on a set of conditions with the 'Conditional Value Assignment' UI in Exploratory.

data.title: Chart
data.desc: Learn how to use Chart features!

insights.title: How to Use Chart
insights.desc: Walks you through how you can get started with Chart in Exploratory and use some of the key features to visualize your data effectively.

insights.title: How to Clean & Transform Data
insights.desc: Walk you through how you can clean and transform your data flexibly with Exploratory.

insights.title: How to use Analytics features
insights.desc: Walk you through how you can start using Analytics features of Exploratory to analyze data by introducing the basic framework for finding correlation among variables and using prediction models to analyze such correlation further.

insights.title: How to Create Dashboards & Notes
insights.desc: Walks you through how you can create Dashboards and Notes quickly with Exploratory. He also introduces how you can share Dashboards and Notes and schedule them at Exploratory Server.
